title: The Impossible Data
key_scenes: Elliot discovers bootstrap paradox in Voyager 2 signal
Mathematical proof from 2045 verified as accurate
Elliot calls ex-wife Cassandra for help
revelations: Voyager signal contains future knowledge from 2045
Signal includes unified field theory and device blueprints
Bootstrap paradox is real and operational
planted_elements: Cassandra's quantum physics expertise (payoff Ch20, Ch56)

Elliot_Cross.knowledge: Confirmed bootstrap paradox, three signal layers, encrypted third layer
Elliot_Cross.relationships: Reaches out to ex-wife despite two-year separation

atmosphere: Noir isolation, rain, 3 AM paranoia, intellectual vertigo
foreshadowing: Warning text suggests other timelines exist
Cassandra's warning that others are looking for signal
temporal_mechanics_established: Information can travel backward in time
Bootstrap paradox creates closed causal loop
Signal contains multiple layers of increasing importance
Timeline appears predetermined but requires execution
next_chapter_hooks: What's in the encrypted third layer?
